Saber Rebaï (Arabic: , Saber al Ruba'i; a mụrụ na 13 Machị 1967) bụ onye na-agụ egwu pan-Arab nke Tunisia, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, na onye na-ede egwu
A maara ya maka abụ ya "Sidi Mansour"
Ụfọdụ abọm na-ebu ụdị transliteration Saber el Rebaii
Ọ bịanyere aka na ya kemgbe afọ 2004 na akara ndekọ pan-Arab Rotana.
A mụrụ Reabï na Tunisia n'ezinụlọ Yemen si Hadramout
N'afọ 2006, mgbe ọ na-eme ihe nkiri na Aden, o kwuru banyere mpako ya dị oke egwu maka ihe nketa Yemen ya.

E wezụga ịbụ onye na-eme violin, ọ malitere ịbụ abụ dịka ọrụ ya mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asaa nke ndị na-agụ egwú gụnyere Mohammed Abdel Wahab, Abd El Kader El Asaly, Wadih El Safi, Abdel Halim Hafez, Karem Mahmoud masịrị ya
Saber dere ụfọdụ n'ime abụ ya nke gụnyere abụ Okwu (Kalima)
Ya na Hilmi Baker, Salah El Charnoubi na Dr
Abd El Rab Idriss rụkọrọ ọrụ.
Saber Rebai gara njem nleta gafee Europe, USA, Australia ma rụọkwa na Palestine na South Korea
O mere ihe ngosi na Olympia na Paris, Carthage na Cairo.
Saber Al Rubai ritere ọtụtụ ihe nrite maka itinye aka na mmemme mba ụwa nke gụnyere:
